dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: That answer will suffice, my lord.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: The outcome of the night's assignment can be reviewed here. All has been done as willed.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Though there is no immediate path toward learning all of my lord's teachings, I will attempt to acquire them in full while the sun shines. It is Faust's expertise.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: My purpose is to fade with the night's glint of the moon. Yet, should I be summoned, I shall stand by my lord as the moon shelters behind the clouds.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: What use is there to learning, to questioning...? A conundrum that had once harrowed my mind. Were it not for my lord... I would have been a mere ordinary human, not Faust.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: A Heishou may be but a tool... but Faust is different. As a beast of the Heishou - Mao Branch... as a Pinky... I am, with my name restored, a loyal blade and a devoted disciple of my lord.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Accessing the Gesellschaft is... necessary, but I do so with reluctance. They attempt again and again to instruct and enlighten me, but gaining an understanding of my lord's teachings already consumes a majority of my days.
... Yet, one must face their disinclinations for the pursuit of learning.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Cloudsplitting Manifestation(雲解顯現). Beasts of the Mao must follow in my wake, for my lord has bestowed me the leash.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
My lord has impressed upon us many times that the righteous do not make weapons of their might.
Yet... even I, a brute whose blade swings before her lips speak, persevere toward righteousness... perhaps that is a road, a way(道) for one to walk down.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: I must be one of the great humans as well, as I have no resentment or covetousness in me. ... My lord, do not laugh.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Your will is understood; that vision of righteousness shall swiftly be realized.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: To restore the righteousness that was lost.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Adept Heishou, into the fray.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Command without hesitation.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Futility inheres in impossibility(不可違也). I will not be restrained.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Futile.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: ... Indeed.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Find your enlightenment, now.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: ... Please straighten my bamboo hat. Yes. That is... enough...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: There are times when a blade has the makings of a solution.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Failed to read the situation at hand.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Perpetual flawlessness is an impossibility. Yet, perseverance in that infinite approach to perfection makes this a non-issue.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Today was a day of no shame, for I have made my contributions to bringing about righteousness. I shall face tomorrow with pride.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: ... The rising sun brings me shame. ... My display of incompetence today was no different from my years as an ordinary human.
